plot: Giada treats her girlfriends to an authentic Italian meal. The dishes prepared are "Bruschetta with Shrimp, Tarragon and Arugula", "Pasta Alla Formiana" and "Stracciatella Semifreddo".
title: "Giada at Home" Basic Italian
plot_es: Giada treats her girlfriends to an authentic Italian meal. The dishes prepared are "Bruschetta with Shrimp, Tarragon and Arugula", "Pasta Alla Formiana" and "Stracciatella Semifreddo".
plot_en: Giada treats her girlfriends to an authentic Italian meal. The dishes prepared are "Bruschetta with Shrimp, Tarragon and Arugula", "Pasta Alla Formiana" and "Stracciatella Semifreddo".
